title: Culture: Arts (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Arts subcategory within Culture. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Haiku poetry expresses very deep thoughts with a very limited number of words.
cards.romaji: Haiku ni wa, kagirareta moji ni fukai omoi ga komerarete imasu.
cards.japanese: 俳句には、限られた文字に深い思いが込められています。
